title: [3-Pack] Italy Travel Power Adapter, VINTAR 3 Prong Grounded Plug with 2 USB and 2 American Outlets, 4 in 1 Outlet Adaptor Dual USB, AC Outlet Adaptor for USA to Italy Uruguay Chile (Type L)
descriptions:
### [3-Pack] Italy Travel Power Adapter by VINTAR

**Product Overview:**
Stay connected and powered up while traveling with the VINTAR 3-Pack Italy Travel Power Adapter. This versatile adapter is designed to meet the needs of modern travelers, offering a combination of 2 USB ports and 2 American outlets, making it perfect for charging your cell phone, tablet, power bank, and other electronic devices. Compatible with Type L outlets found in Italy, Chile, Uruguay, and several other countries, this adapter ensures you can use your devices anywhere without worrying about power compatibility.

**Key Features:**

- **4-in-1 Design:** Equipped with 2 USB ports and 2 American outlets, allowing you to charge multiple devices simultaneously.
- **Dual USB Charging:** Each USB port supports up to 2.4A output, ensuring fast charging for your smartphones and tablets.
- **Grounded 3 Prong Plug:** Provides safe and secure connections with Type L outlets.
- **Wide Voltage Compatibility:** Supports 100V-250V, making it ideal for use in a variety of countries.
- **Ultra-Light and Compact:** Dimensions of 2.8 x 2.6 x 2.3 inches make it easy to carry in your travel bag.
- **Certified Quality:** CE and FCC certified for safety and reliability.
- **12-Month Warranty:** Backed by a 12-month warranty and friendly customer service for peace of mind.

**Technical Specifications:**

- **Input Compatibility:** Standard N American 2 or 3 prong flat pin plug
- **Max Capacity:** 2500W (Max 250V, 10A)
- **USB Output:** Up to 2.4A
- **Dimensions:** 2.8 x 2.6 x 2.3 inches
- **Weight:** Ultra-light and compact
- **Certifications:** CE, FCC
- **Warranty:** 12 months
- **Customer Service:** Friendly and responsive

**Compatible Countries:**
- Italy
- Chile
- Cuba
- Eritrea
- Ethiopia
- Libya
- San Marino
- Syria
- Uruguay
- Vatican City

**Additional Notes:**
- This adapter is **not a converter**. Devices must support 100V-250V dual voltage for proper operation, especially for high-power electronics.

**Ideal For:**
- Cell phones
- Tablets
- Power banks
- Other electronic devices

**Why Choose VINTAR:**
VINTAR is committed to providing high-quality, reliable, and user-friendly travel accessories. Our Italy Travel Power Adapter is designed to make your travel experience seamless and convenient. With a 12-month warranty and friendly customer service, you can trust VINTAR to keep your devices charged and ready to go.

**Order Now:**
Don't let power issues ruin your trip. Get your VINTAR 3-Pack Italy Travel Power Adapter today and stay connected no matter where your travels take you!
